Family Tree Lineage Index
Margaret Greenman

Margaret’s parents, Sarah Clarke and Edward Greenman Jr., were married on May 11, 1721 in Washington County, Rhode Island (1A). Four years later, Margaret was born on the 17th of October, 1725 in Charlestown, Rhode Island.

References

1. Vital Record of Rhode Island. 1636-1850. A Family Register for the People. 21 volumes. Arnold, James Newell. Providence, R.I.: Narragansett Historical Publishing Company, 1891–1912. Digitized images from Cornell Univesity Library.

    Vol. 5. Washington County: Charlestown - Marriages, pg. 7.

  • B. Margaret’s Birth

    Vol. 5. Washington County: Charlestown - Births and Deaths, pg. 21.

  • C. Joseph and Margaret's Marriage

    Vol. 5. Washington County: Westerly - Marriages, pg. 33

  • D. Edward’s Birth

    Vol. 5. Washington County: Westerly - Births and Deaths, pg. 104

2. Greene, F. L. (1894). Descendants of Joseph Greene of Westerly, R.I: Also other branches of the Greenes of Quidnesset, or Kingston, R.I., and other lines of Greenes in America. Albany, N.Y: Joel Munsell’s Sons.

  • Joseph Greene - pg. 16

3. Find A Grave, database and images (https://www.findagrave.com), memorial page for Margaret Greenman Green (17 Oct 1725–4 Dec 1808), Find A Grave Memorial no. 159964089, citing Center Berlin Baptist Cemetery, Berlin, Rensselaer County, New York, USA; Maintained by root bound (contributor 48845271).

Born: October, 17, 1725 (1)

Birthplace: Charlestown, Rhode Island (1)

Mother: Sarah Greenman (1)

Father: Edward Greenman Jr. (1)

Husband: Joseph Greene (2, 3)

Married: September 20, 1747 (2)

Marriage Place: Westerly, Washington County, Rhode Island (2)

Direct Descendant: Judge Edward Greene (1, 2, 3)

Death: December 4, 1808 (3)

Death Place: Berlin Rensselaer County, New York (3)

Burial Place: Center Berlin Baptist Cemetery, Berlin, Rensselaer County, New York (3)
